attributes.action: car insurance shouldn't just be about postcodes,full no claims means never claimed why should we be victimized
attributes.additional_details: car insurance shouldn't just be about postcodes,full no claims means never claimed why should you be victimized ,car insurers shouldn't increase your car insurance because of were you live,you could have lived in that same postcode all your life and owned a motor vehicle and paid fully comprehensive insurance and built up full no claims,which means you've never claimed your car hasn't been stolen,you haven't had a crash,so why should our renewals keep rising.this needs to stop and until we all stand up for our selfs,we will continue to be victimized,so sign this e-petition and get this sorted.
